name: Happy Find: Hidden Objects
description:
Welcome to the world of Happy Find!

It is a game to find various objects and collect them all to complete the map!
To pass the level, you have to check the list of hidden objects which is on the bottom of the screen, and look for the object from the big town people live in.
If you collect an essential number of objects, you can continue to the next area of the town.

Do you need a clue or a hint?
Are you looking for intuitive easy puzzle games?
Try Happy Find! There is no hurry to collect objects. Also, special items will help you. “Compass” will show you direction to the hidden object, and ”Magnifying glass“ tells you the nearest hidden object. Feel free to enjoy Happy Find!


How to enjoy Happy Find

1.Relax and look for objects
Calm down and check your list.
Please don't be in a hurry, observe the town carefully.

2. Spend long days with the town
You would be healed whenever you see the lives of cute people in this town, even if your journey to find all hidden objects is a struggle.

3. You don't have to collect perfectly — no need to be perfect.
You need not feel guilty. Special Items will help your adventure!

If you like Scavenger Hunt, June's Journey, Where's Waldo?, and Find Out, Happy Find will also be one of your favorite choices. Let's download Happy Find now! This game is so easy that it's perfect for your kids to play! People of all ages can play, so let's play with your family and friends and get excited!

Feature functions:
• Tap to collect the listed items.
• Intuitive UI and UX
• Colorful Art will entertain your whole family
• Hint and clue are always available for each stage
• Simple game design to suit any age group
• No need to rush—there is no time limit
• Take your time and relax
• Easy to figure out puzzle
• Judgment is made user friendly
• Friendly tips, all for free!
What are you waiting for? Start Treasure Hunt now!

Let's play Happy Find right away!
